StationInfos.Title: LULUX train station
StationInfos.Content: LULUX  train station, served by Thalys, Eurostar, TGV®, and ICE trains, is the ideal starting point for your journeys to Germany, France, The Netherlands, Luxembourg and the United Kingdom and connects travellers to the entire Belgian domestic railway network.

StationInfos.Title: LULUX Travel and tourist information services
StationInfos.Content: LULUX At Bruxelles-Midi/Brussel-Zuid train station, you'll find several information desks for domestic and international travel, as well as an international Thalys info desk and a a Brussels Tourist Office desk.

Parkings.Title: Q-Park "Gare du Midi"
Parkings.Content: Direct access to LULUX train station. Open 24/7.
